meanings.definition: Houstonias: a genus of plants in the Rubiaceae family
meanings.sent1: The houstonias in the garden are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I spotted some lovely houstonias while hiking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The houstonias in the backyard seem to be having a party with the bees.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening blossomed like houstonias in spring.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the houstonias brightened up the entire yard.

meanings.definition: Houstonias: a type of wildflower commonly found in North America
meanings.sent1: The field was covered in colorful houstonias.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy taking pictures of houstonias in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The houstonias whispered secrets to the passing butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheerful as a field of houstonias.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the houstonias filled the air with sweetness.
